attributes.title: 2021 BMW M4 Coupe Competition

attributes.description:
The Hilux is a South African institution. It’s the largest volume seller locally, and as the one-ton transport and logistics solution to most mining operations, small business enterprises and rural South Africa’s famers, Hilux is a vital cog in the economic dynamism of the country. The turbodiesel 3.0 D-4D retains its strong torque characteristics, serving up 343Nm from 1 400r/min. It runs quietly and smoothly in combination with the four-speed auto. Off-road the four-speed auto and two-pedal convenience is sure to appeal to novice off-roaders, or those who often drive trails in convoy and enjoy impromptu stops on gradient surfaces.
But Hilux 4x4s are also bought for their off-road capabilities and we would never argue with what they can do. D-4Ds are used, for example, with slight suspension modifications and special wheels, to set the route for the Dakar Rally. They are otherwise dead standard, as driven off South American showroom floors. Can’t argue with that.

This specific Hilux has a Beekman Executive Canopy and the popular Hannibal Roof rack, It also has long range fuel tank and dual battery system. This Hilux has just been serviced by Rola Toyota and is ready to take you on an adventure.

Finance available and
Trade ins welcome.
